ai-patthana23.13:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.13:1.1_0: or unskillful qualities are not inferior or superior.
ai-patthana23.13:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.13:2.1_0: Not skillfulness arises in this way: by the teaching does not arise because of a cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.13:3.1_0: Not doing a skillful quality, no cause or reason arises conditioned by what is skillful,
